context: Take-Two Interactive Software, Inc. is a video game publisher focused on Grand Theft Auto, NBA 2K, and other AAA game franchises. GTA V ongoing success. NBA 2K esports.

competitors.name: Activision Blizzard
competitors.notes: Call of Duty and Blizzard Entertainment games
